Audio

Class MixerSetUp

  • java.lang.Object
    • Audio.MixerSetUp

  • public class MixerSetUp
extends java.lang.Object
    MixerSetUp class represents a 32 channel mixer than may consist of one or or more lines of data. A mixer will be set up with one single data line for audio data and additional lines (aka channels/tracks) may be added to the audio system.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MixerSetUp(int audioPreferences)
      Create a mixer object with a given i/o choice from mixinfos.
